overview: For the past 15 years, Mr. Coleman has held various Sales and Sales Management positions in the Information Technology Industry. While at Kaseya, Coleman led a team of seasoned software sales professionals responsible for serving the needs of Kaseyas Enterprise market segment in North America. His passion for encouraging corporate IT departments to better align with business objectives resulted in impressive year-over-year revenue and customer acquisition growth for Kaseya. His portfolio also includes IBM, Talisma Corporation and Captura Software. Mr. Coleman is a graduate of the University of Notre Dame.
